Title: Requires schools to allow fire departments to make a recruitment presentation in a high school
Summary: Requires the principal of any high school to allow any local fire department, upon request, to enter the school for the purpose of fire department junior recruitment, including, but not limited to: making presentations; disseminating literature; and answering questions by students.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring schools to allow fire departments to make a recruitment presentation in a high school
